meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the May 1, 2024 City Council Meeting
Consideration of appointments to boards and commissions
agenda_items.description: Evaluation and duties of board and commission members (List of nominees is available in the City Secretary's Office)

agenda_items.title: Receive the report of the Ad Hoc City Council Canvassing Committee
agenda_items.description: Adopt a resolution and order accepting the canvassing committee's report declaring the results of the May 4, 2024 special bond election held within the City of Dallas

financial_items.description: Financing for the special bond election
financial_items.amount: No cost consideration to the City
